body: @jaredkerim this PR is about 6 weeks old at this point. Do you have any concrete plans to finish this out? If not, I'm inclined to close this PR as the likelyhood that it hasn't bitrotted is approaching 0%. You could re-open this PR with an updated branch when you're ready to work on it again.
